title: im looking for a team to play ranked
body: m pretty good at all positions except for support i am silver 3 but i have a very good kda and i always have a positive attitude pm me DRABSCHY

replies.body: Hey Man, We currently have an opening for an adc/jungler atm. Add me. We are currently 3/0 in placements :)
I can link you to a friend, he is gold 5. If you feel that is not too far above you...
